attribute.description: Id of the HTML tag. If no property is defined, id defaults the property as well.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Type of field. One of: output, text, password, select.
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: Name of the entity. Provides the label in form "[entity].[property]".
attribute.name: entity

attribute.description: Property of the bean. If no property is defined, it is defaulted by id.
attribute.name: property

attribute.description: Code of the hint type. The hint is retrieved from labels in the form "[entity].[property].[hint-type-code].hint".
attribute.name: hint

attribute.description: Set to true to prevent default Ajax validation.
attribute.name: customAjaxValidation

attribute.description: Style class to assign to the control element.
attribute.name: class

attribute.description: Set to true to disable select widgets.
attribute.name: disabled
